content: The More You Think — The More Grave The Problem Seems Your life is a roller-coaster ride. It has ups-and-downs, you cry and laugh. Sometimes you are scared but you enjoy the ride afterwards. The thrill is amazing. We don’t want to get off from it but we know there is an end to it. You might a chance or two but soon it ends. Most of your problems are surrounded on the idea of other people. Let it go and buy yourself some peace. Here is a link to sign up for my personal list
